alert.note: Alert for Bledsoe; Hamilton; McMinn; Meigs; Rhea; Roane; Sequatchie (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 12:08PM CDT until August 07 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Rhea County in east Tennessee... Sequatchie County in east Tennessee... Meigs County in east Tennessee... Bledsoe County in east Tennessee... Northwestern McMinn County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Hamilton County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Roane County in east Tennessee... * Until 200 PM EDT/100 PM CDT/. * At 107 PM EDT/1207 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 14 miles north of Pikeville to 12 miles south of Spencer to 8 miles northwest of Tracy City, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Athens, Dayton, Dunlap, Pikeville, Decatur, Soddy-Daisy, Fairview, Spring City, Graysville and Flat Top Mountain. This includes Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 51 and 55. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT/600 PM CDT/ for east Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bledsoe; Hamilton; McMinn; Meigs; Rhea; Roane; Sequatchie
